com.mygdx.tetris.logic

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.tetris.logic.GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Main logic component. Holds the blocks, score and others.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameModel(int columns, int lines)
      Initializes a game with user-defined dimensions.

        Initializes a game with user-defined dimensions.

        public java.util.TreeSet<Block> getBlocks()
        Returns the blocks currently laid down, all the blocks which aren't in the current piece.

      • getMap

      • getCompletedLines

        public int getCompletedLines()

      • nextCycle

        public void nextCycle(Direction direction)
               throws CorruptedCell
        Advances the game's flow. Each cycle will move the current piece in the wanted direction and will check for line completion.
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction to move the current piece in (left, right or down).
        Throws:
        CorruptedCell

      • getStatus

        public GameStatus getStatus()
        Returns the current game status.
        Returns:
        Status indicating if the game is in progress or ended.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restarts the game. Resets score to 0, eliminates blocks and map contents and initializes and draws a new piece.
